attributes.action: Ensure that all football matches involving British national teams are covered by terestrial TV channels.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Surely our national sporting teams are there for the enjoyment of each and every citizen? Currently, it seems they are there to line the pockets of faceless corporations. Ensure that the working man has free access to the people who represent him on the world stage and make yourself the most popular PM in generations.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
